name: Regulatory & Compliance Agent
tagline: Navigates regulatory requirements and tracks compliance status
overview: The Regulatory & Compliance Agent helps teams navigate complex regulatory requirements across emissions, safety, trade, and other domains. It interprets regulations, tracks compliance status, alerts to upcoming changes, and supports audit preparation with organized documentation.
whatItDoes: Interprets regulatory requirements in context of Cummins operations
Tracks compliance status across products and facilities
Alerts teams to upcoming regulatory changes
Supports audit preparation with documentation organization
Maps regulations to specific product requirements
prompts: What are the EPA 2027 requirements for our medium-duty engines?
Which products need EU Stage VI certification by next year?
What documentation do we need for the upcoming ISO audit?
How does the new trade regulation affect our China suppliers?
Show me compliance status for the X15 product family

impact.description: Complete view across products and regulations

guardrails: Regulatory interpretation validated by legal and compliance teams
Does not make certification or compliance decisions

All regulatory advice includes 'consult legal/compliance' guidance
